snippet.title: Closed Beta Starts in September! | Dev Update - Seekers of Skyveil
snippet.description:
Sign up and wishlist on Steam to get your alpha rewards: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2402420?utm_source=social&utm_campaign=reveal&utm_medium=youtube&utm_content=dev_update
Cheers to entering Closed Beta alongside y'all in September 2024!

Timestamps:
Intros: 0:00
What’s SoS?: 0:43
The maps: 1:40
Seeker design: 3:00
New Seeker 👀: 3:47
What’s an extraction hero?: 4:13
Seeker art style: 4:39
Closed beta: 5:15
Sign-up to play: 6:07

We think the extraction genre should be more than grim-dark military sims and first-person shooters. So we’re making Seekers of Skyveil, a fast-paced extraction game with brawly teamfights, full-on heroes, and RPG systems. Add in gameplay that’s easy to learn and hard to master, and now we’re cooking!

Keep in touch and find the latest news at:
Discord: https://discord.gg/playseekers
Twitter: https://twitter.com/playseekers
